
modify-event-subscription
*************************


DESCRIPTION
===========


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws rds modify-event-subscription
     --subscription-name <value>
     [--event-categories <value>]
     [--enabled ]
     [--source-type <value>]
     [--sns-topic-arn <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--subscription-name"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--event-categories"  (list of string)

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]

"--enabled"  (boolean)

"--source-type"  (string)

"--sns-topic-arn"  (string)
